dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The Financial Monitoring Agency in West Kazakhstan Region just wrapped up a major investigation into a credit partnership head.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Financial Monitoring Agency in West Kazakhstan Region just wrapped up a major investigation into a credit partnership head.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Authorities have completed an investigation into the head of a credit partnership in the West Kazakhstan Region, who is suspected of embezzling over 150 million tenge in state subsidies, citing the Financial Monitoring Agency (FMA).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, the one involving over 150 million tenge in embezzled state subsidies, that's uh, a huge amount of money.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, the one involving over one hundred fifty million tenge in embezzled state subsidies, that's uh, a huge amount of money.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Authorities have completed an investigation into the head of a credit partnership in the West Kazakhstan Region, who is suspected of embezzling over 150 million tenge in state subsidies, citing the Financial Monitoring Agency (FMA).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And he allegedly got more than 126 million through the Agrobusiness program by registering loans under a farm he controlled.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And he allegedly got more than one hundred twenty six million through the Agrobusiness program by registering loans under a farm he controlled.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the agency, the suspect illegally obtained more than 126 million tenge in preferential loans under the Agrobusiness program by registering them under a farm he controlled.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which he then just cashed out, so the money never actually went to farming, it was just, like, pure fraud.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which he then just cashed out, so the money never actually went to farming, it was just, like, pure fraud.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The funds were later cashed out.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it gets worse—he also faked data about livestock to get another 24 million from that national agro-industrial complex project.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it gets worse-he also faked data about livestock to get another twenty four million from that national agro-industrial complex project.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, he allegedly submitted false information to the state database about non-existent livestock in order to receive another 24 million tenge through the national project Development of the Agro-Industrial Complex for 2017"2021.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Forged documents claiming he bought pedigree cows? That's so brazen.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Forged documents claiming he bought pedigree cows? That's so brazen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Investigators say the suspect used forged documents claiming he had purchased pedigree cows from other farms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And instead of cows, he used the stolen funds to buy land and build a shopping center and a sauna.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And instead of cows, he used the stolen funds to buy land and build a shopping center and a sauna.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The suspect used the criminal proceeds to purchase land plots where he built a shopping center and a sauna.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: A sauna? Seriously? He used public agriculture money to build a sauna?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A sauna? Seriously? He used public agriculture money to build a sauna?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The suspect used the criminal proceeds to purchase land plots where he built a shopping center and a sauna.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and to hide it, he put everything under a relative's name. But authorities seized it all—land, the shopping center, even an Exeed LX vehicle.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and to hide it, he put everything under a relative's name. But authorities seized it all-land, the shopping center, even an Exeed L X vehicle.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To hide the assets, he registered the properties under a relative's name, the FMA said. With court approval, authorities seized assets worth 198 million tenge, including two land plots, a shopping center, a sauna, and an Exeed LX vehicle.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So they recovered about 198 million tenge in assets. That's something at least.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So they recovered about one hundred ninety eight million tenge in assets. That's something at least.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: With court approval, authorities seized assets worth 198 million tenge, including two land plots, a shopping center, a sauna, and an Exeed LX vehicle.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And he's in custody now. But this case is part of a bigger pattern—27 people suspected in a billion-tenge scheme.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he's in custody now. But this case is part of a bigger patternminus twenty seven people suspected in a billion-tenge scheme.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The suspect has been taken into custody. Scheme for embezzling billions of tenge uncovered: 27 people suspected

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It makes you wonder how many similar schemes are still operating under the radar.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It makes you wonder how many similar schemes are still operating under the radar.
